meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>sacrifice</kanji> <kanji>fly</kanji> is a <vocabulary>sacrifice fly</vocabulary>. In baseball, this is when you hit the ball in the air so the runner can tag up and move up a base.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the on'yomi readings. For 飛 just think about how <reading>he</reading> (ひ) hit a sacrifice fly, and he hit it so hard the ball <reading>he</reading>ated up.
